attributes.action: Inform Inland Revenue that Hazel Blears has defrauded them with regard Capital Gains Tax due on the sale of her second home, and Inland revenue should end its secrecy and publish the result of such enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There must not be one law for MP's and another for the public who in fact employ MP's

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
